election_record.label: Vermont 1809 Governor

overview.note: The Official Results list Jonas Galusha with 14583 votes and Isaac Tichenor with 13467 votes, but the county totals add up to 14611 for Galusha and 13485 for Tichenor.

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: The Official Results list Jonas Galusha with 1362 votes and Isaac Tichenor with 1392 votes but the town totals add up to 1365 for Galusha and 1382 for Tichenor.
The Vermont Republican, October 16, The Reporter, October 21, and the Anti-Monarchist, and Republican Watchman (Northampton, MA), October 25, list 1192 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Addison County.
The Green Mountain Farmer, October 2, lists 1123 votes for Jonas Galusha and 1162 for Isaac Tichenor in Addison County.

sub_unit.name: Addison
sub_unit.note: Several sources, including the Vermont Courier, September 16, the Middlebury Mercury (Middlebury, VT), September 13 and 20, and the Green Mountain Farmer, September 18 and October 2, list 58 votes for Jonas Galusha and 23 for Isaac Tichenor in Addison.
The Weekly Wanderer (Randolph, VT), September 22, the Vermont Republican, September 18, and the North Star (Danville, VT), September 23, list 46 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Addison.

sub_unit.name: Bridport
sub_unit.note: The Weekly Wanderer (Randolph, VT), September 15 and 22, the Vermont Republican, September 18, and the North Star (Danville, VT), September 23, list 100 votes for Jonas Galusha and 96 for Isaac Tichenor in Bridport.
The Green Mountain Patriot (Peacham, VT), September 9 and 16 list 23 votes for Jonas Galusha and none for Isaac Tichenor in Bridport.

sub_unit.name: Bristol
sub_unit.note: The Vermont Courier, September 16, the Vermont Centinel (Burlington, VT), September 22, and the Middlebury Mercury (Middlebury, VT), September 5, list 19 votes for Isaac Tichenor in Bristol.
